      • findMatchesInternal

        public boolean findMatchesInternal(ForwardIndexDocument fiDoc,
                                   int pos,
                                   int direction,
                                   Set<Integer> matchEnds)
        Description copied from class: NfaState
        Find all matches for this NFA in the token source.
        Parameters:
        fiDoc - where to read tokens from
        pos - current matching position
        direction - matching direction
        matchEnds - where to collect the matches found, or null if we don't want to collect them
        Returns:
        true if any (new) matches were found, false if not

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        statesVisited - states we've already visited, so we can deal with cycles

      • finishInternal

        protected void finishInternal(Set<NfaState> visited)
        Description copied from class: NfaState
        Visit each node and replace dangling arrows (nulls) with the match state.
        Specified by:
        finishInternal in class NfaState
        Parameters:
        visited - nodes visited so far, this one included. finish() uses this to make sure we don't visit the same node twice, so always call finish() in your implementations, not finishInternal().
